% generated by Ott 0.25 from: coint.ott
\newcommand{\ottdrule}[4][]{{\displaystyle\frac{\begin{array}{l}#2\end{array}}{#3}\quad\ottdrulename{#4}}}
\newcommand{\ottusedrule}[1]{\[#1\]}
\newcommand{\ottpremise}[1]{ #1 \\}
\newenvironment{ottdefnblock}[3][]{ \framebox{\mbox{#2}} \quad #3 \\[0pt]}{}
\newenvironment{ottfundefnblock}[3][]{ \framebox{\mbox{#2}} \quad #3 \\[0pt]\begin{displaymath}\begin{array}{l}}{\end{array}\end{displaymath}}
\newcommand{\ottfunclause}[2]{ #1 \equiv #2 \\}
\newcommand{\ottnt}[1]{\mathit{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottmv}[1]{\mathit{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottkw}[1]{\mathbf{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottsym}[1]{#1}
\newcommand{\ottcom}[1]{\text{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulename}[1]{\textsc{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottcomplu}[5]{\overline{#1}^{\,#2\in #3 #4 #5}}
\newcommand{\ottcompu}[3]{\overline{#1}^{\,#2<#3}}
\newcommand{\ottcomp}[2]{\overline{#1}^{\,#2}}
\newcommand{\ottgrammartabular}[1]{\begin{supertabular}{llcllllll}#1\end{supertabular}}
\newcommand{\ottmetavartabular}[1]{\begin{supertabular}{ll}#1\end{supertabular}}
\newcommand{\ottrulehead}[3]{$#1$ & & $#2$ & & & \multicolumn{2}{l}{#3}}
\newcommand{\ottprodline}[6]{& & $#1$ & $#2$ & $#3 #4$ & $#5$ & $#6$}
\newcommand{\ottfirstprodline}[6]{\ottprodline{#1}{#2}{#3}{#4}{#5}{#6}}
\newcommand{\ottlongprodline}[2]{& & $#1$ & \multicolumn{4}{l}{$#2$}}
\newcommand{\ottfirstlongprodline}[2]{\ottlongprodline{#1}{#2}}
\newcommand{\ottbindspecprodline}[6]{\ottprodline{#1}{#2}{#3}{#4}{#5}{#6}}
\newcommand{\ottprodnewline}{\\}
\newcommand{\ottinterrule}{\\[5.0mm]}
\newcommand{\ottafterlastrule}{\\}
\newcommand{\ottmetavars}{
\ottmetavartabular{
 $ \ottmv{termvar} ,\, \ottmv{x} ,\, \ottmv{y} $ &  \\
 $ \ottmv{index} ,\, \ottmv{i} ,\, \ottmv{j} ,\, \ottmv{k} $ &  \\
}}

\newcommand{\ottd}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{d}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottsym{1}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{2}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottpol}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{pol}  ,\ \ottnt{p}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottsym{+}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{-}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\otttype}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{type}  ,\ \ottnt{S}  ,\ \ottnt{T}  ,\ \ottnt{R}}{::=}{\ottcom{Cointuitionistic types}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottsym{0}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{S}  \ottsym{+}  \ottnt{T}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{S}  \ottsym{-}  \ottnt{T}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{S}  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottterm}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{term}  ,\ \ottnt{t}}{::=}{\ottcom{Cointuitionistic terms}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottmv{x}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{unit} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{in}_{ \ottnt{d} }\, \ottmv{x} . \ottnt{t} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \langle  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} , \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \rangle }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \lambda  \ottmv{x} . \ottnt{t} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{cut}\, \ottmv{x} . \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \bullet  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottG}{
\ottrulehead{\Gamma}{::=}{\ottcom{Cointuitionistic contexts}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\emptyset}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{p} \, \ottnt{S}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma'}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \Gamma  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottgrammar}{\ottgrammartabular{
\ottd\ottinterrule
\ottpol\ottinterrule
\otttype\ottinterrule
\ottterm\ottinterrule
\ottG\ottafterlastrule
}}

% defnss
% defns Jtype
%% defn ctxneg
\newcommand{\ottdrulenegXXemptyName}[0]{\ottdrulename{neg\_empty}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulenegXXempty}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \emptyset \,\mathsf{Neg} }{%
{\ottdrulenegXXemptyName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulenegXXnegName}[0]{\ottdrulename{neg\_neg}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulenegXXneg}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma \,\mathsf{Neg} }%
}{
 \ottsym{(}  \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{-} \, \ottnt{S}  \ottsym{)} \,\mathsf{Neg} }{%
{\ottdrulenegXXnegName}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnctxneg}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ \Gamma \,\mathsf{Neg} $}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulenegXXempty{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulenegXXneg{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

%% defn ctxok
\newcommand{\ottdruleokXXemptyName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ok\_empty}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleokXXempty}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \emptyset \,\mathsf{Ok} }{%
{\ottdruleokXXemptyName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleokXXnegName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ok\_neg}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleokXXneg}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma \,\mathsf{Ok} }%
}{
 \ottsym{(}  \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{-} \, \ottnt{S}  \ottsym{)} \,\mathsf{Ok} }{%
{\ottdruleokXXnegName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleokXXposName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ok\_pos}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleokXXpos}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma \,\mathsf{Neg} }%
}{
 \ottsym{(}  \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{+} \, \ottnt{S}  \ottsym{)} \,\mathsf{Ok} }{%
{\ottdruleokXXposName}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnctxok}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ \Gamma \,\mathsf{Ok} $}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleokXXempty{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleokXXneg{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleokXXpos{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

%% defn type
\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXvarName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ty\_var}}
\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottsym{(}  \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{p} \, \ottnt{S}  \ottsym{)} \,\mathsf{Ok} }%
}{
\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{p} \, \ottnt{S}  \vdash  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{p} \, \ottnt{S}}{%
{\ottdruletyXXvarName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXiLName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ty\_iL}}
\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXiL}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma \,\mathsf{Neg} }%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash   \mathsf{unit}   \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{-} \, \ottsym{0}}{%
{\ottdruletyXXiLName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXorLName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ty\_orL}}
\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXorL}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{-} \, \ottnt{S}  \quad  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{-} \, \ottnt{T}   \quad   \Gamma \,\mathsf{Neg} }%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{-} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{S}  \ottsym{+}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdruletyXXorLName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXorROneName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ty\_orR1}}
\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXorROne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{-} \, \ottnt{T}  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{+} \, \ottnt{S}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash   \mathsf{in}_{ \ottsym{1} }\, \ottmv{x} . \ottnt{t}   \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{+} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{S}  \ottsym{+}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdruletyXXorROneName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXorRTwoName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ty\_orR2}}
\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXorRTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{-} \, \ottnt{S}  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{+} \, \ottnt{T}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash   \mathsf{in}_{ \ottsym{2} }\, \ottmv{x} . \ottnt{t}   \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{+} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{S}  \ottsym{+}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdruletyXXorRTwoName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXsubLName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ty\_subL}}
\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXsubL}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{-} \, \ottnt{S}  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{-} \, \ottnt{T}  \quad   \Gamma \,\mathsf{Neg} }%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash   \lambda  \ottmv{x} . \ottnt{t}   \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{-} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{S}  \ottsym{-}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdruletyXXsubLName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXsubRName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ty\_subR}}
\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXsubR}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{-} \, \ottnt{S}  \quad  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{+} \, \ottnt{T}  \quad   \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} \,\mathsf{Neg} }%
}{
\Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash   \langle  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} , \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \rangle   \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{+} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{S}  \ottsym{-}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdruletyXXsubRName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXcutName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ty\_cut}}
\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXcut}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{-} \, \ottnt{S}  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{-} \, \ottnt{T}  \quad  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{-} \, \ottnt{S}  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{+} \, \ottnt{T}   \quad   \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} \,\mathsf{Neg} }%
}{
\Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash   \mathsf{cut}\, \ottmv{x} . \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \bullet  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{+} \, \ottnt{S}}{%
{\ottdruletyXXcutName}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefntype}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{p} \, \ottnt{S}$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXvar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXiL{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXorL{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXorROne{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXorRTwo{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXsubL{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXsubR{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletyXXcut{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsJtype}{
\ottdefnctxneg{}\ottdefnctxok{}\ottdefntype{}}

% defns Jrw
%% defn rw
\newcommand{\ottdrulerwXXcbName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rw\_cb}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerwXXcb}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \mathsf{cut}\, \ottmv{y} .  \lambda  \ottmv{x} . \ottnt{t}   \bullet   \langle  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} , \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \rangle    \rightsquigarrow   \mathsf{cut}\, \ottmv{y} . \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{t}  \bullet  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdrulerwXXcbName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerwXXorOneName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rw\_or1}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerwXXorOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \mathsf{cut}\, \ottmv{y} . \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \bullet   \mathsf{in}_{ \ottsym{1} }\, \ottmv{x} . \ottnt{t}    \rightsquigarrow   \mathsf{cut}\, \ottmv{y} . \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \bullet  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{t} }{%
{\ottdrulerwXXorOneName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerwXXorTwoName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rw\_or2}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerwXXorTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \mathsf{cut}\, \ottmv{y} . \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \bullet   \mathsf{in}_{ \ottsym{2} }\, \ottmv{x} . \ottnt{t}    \rightsquigarrow   \mathsf{cut}\, \ottmv{y} . \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \bullet  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{t} }{%
{\ottdrulerwXXorTwoName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerwXXreturnName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rw\_return}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerwXXreturn}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottmv{x}  \notin \mathsf{FV}( \ottnt{t} ) }%
}{
 \mathsf{cut}\, \ottmv{x} . \ottnt{t}  \bullet  \ottmv{x}   \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t}}{%
{\ottdrulerwXXreturnName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerwXXcutName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rw\_cut}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerwXXcut}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \mathsf{cut}\, \ottmv{y} . \ottnt{t}  \bullet  \ottsym{(}   \mathsf{cut}\, \ottmv{x} . \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \bullet  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{)}   \rightsquigarrow   \mathsf{cut}\, \ottmv{x} . \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \bullet  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdrulerwXXcutName}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnrw}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerwXXcb{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerwXXorOne{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerwXXorTwo{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerwXXreturn{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerwXXcut{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsJrw}{
\ottdefnrw{}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnss}{
\ottdefnsJtype
\ottdefnsJrw
}

\newcommand{\ottall}{\ottmetavars\\[0pt]
\ottgrammar\\[5.0mm]
\ottdefnss}
